title: Smoking bans finds decrease in smoke exposure in public and private places

title_detail.value: Smoking bans finds decrease in smoke exposure in public and private places

summary: Exposure to secondhand smoke has long been associated with negative health effects. A study of secondhand smoke exposure after two smoking bans in Spain, suggests that overall exposure can be decreased across all settings by comprehensive legislative efforts.

summary_detail.value: Exposure to secondhand smoke has long been associated with negative health effects. A study of secondhand smoke exposure after two smoking bans in Spain, suggests that overall exposure can be decreased across all settings by comprehensive legislative efforts.
